keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: While Turkish citizens appear to have chosen democracy, the man they kept in power is working hard against a democratic society.
snippet: While Turkish citizens appear to have chosen democracy, the man they kept in power is working hard against a democratic society....
abstract: Editorial criticizes Turkish Pres Recep Tayyip Erdogan for exploiting crisis created by attempted military coup to further repress dissent in country; warns that fallout from coup will likely be further weakening of country's democracy.
